name: Tangrams Deluxe
description: A tangram is a Chinese logic puzzle in which you must fit seven pieces into a target shape without any overlapping. Enjoy solving over 200 deceptively simple puzzles in Tangrams Deluxe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
